name: a2h-drawer
description: A universal React component library for PWA Add to Home Screen flows with iOS-native UI design

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && bun run build:cjs && bun run build:esm && bun run build:types
scripts.build:esm: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target browser --format esm --sourcemap --external react --external react-dom --external @radix-ui/react-dialog --external @radix-ui/react-slot --external vaul --external react-remove-scroll --external use-sidecar
scripts.build:cjs: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist/temp --target browser --format cjs --sourcemap --external react --external react-dom --external @radix-ui/react-dialog --external @radix-ui/react-slot --external vaul --external react-remove-scroll --external use-sidecar && mv dist/temp/index.js dist/index.cjs && mv dist/temp/index.js.map dist/index.cjs.map && rm -rf dist/temp

author: posaune0423
